title: [Large-Scale] Cost Analysis of Virtual Language Education: Applying the Activity-Based Costing (ABC) Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of financial management and educational operations processes, experience in language education curriculum design
context.additional_context: Strengthening virtual education cost analysis capabilities for corporate language program operations. Focuses on economic efficiency evaluations of multilingual education (integrated reading, writing, speaking) for cultivating global talent.

learning_goals: Using the ABC model, learners can classify and calculate costs for key activities in virtual language courses (e.g., grammar lectures, vocabulary training, writing feedback).
Analyze the cost proportion of human resources (e.g., instructional design, language lectures, pronunciation correction) in educational operations.
Based on analysis, propose cost-effective strategies for virtual language education (e.g., multilingual support, personalized learning paths).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
